text: Adair County is a county in the U.S. state of Oklahoma. As of 2020, 19,495 people lived there. Its county seat is Stilwell. == History == The county was created in 1907. == Geography == The county has a total area of 577 square miles. == Places == === Cities === * Stilwell (county seat) === Towns === * Watts * Westville === Other === * Ballard * Baron * Bell * Bunch * Cherry Tree * Chewey * Christie * Elm Grove * Elohim City * Fairfield * Greasy * Lyons Switch * Marietta * Mulberry * Old Green * Peavine * Piney * Proctor * Rocky Mountain * Salem * Titanic * Watts Community * Wauhillau * West Peavine * Zion ==References== Category:1907 establishments in Oklahoma Category:Oklahoma counties
title: Adair County, Oklahoma
